page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
These are some of the games we play in the playground:
KILL. Kill is a game that we play on the climbing frame. Two people hang onto the bar with their feet off the ground. You move towards each other and try to push the other person off. The person who stays on is the winne
KISS TICK. The girls chase the boys round the playground and when they catch them they have to kiss them. You give them 10 seconds to get away after they have been kissed.
CATCH. You stand in a circle and pass a ball round. If you drop it, you have to run round the circle and if the other people can get the ball back to your place before you return, you are out.
